item.title: Can someone tell me what i am doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You are just putting if(playername = “crab”);, your not actually changing the rights:

[code]

if (playername.equalsIgnorecase(“Crab”))
{

playerRights = 3   // note that you change the value of playerRights here [/code]

Read full topic

@crabman wrote:

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playername.equalsIgnorecase(“Crab”))
{

if (playerRights == 3)[/code]

This is what i pute in the the client java… i log into my server and it doesnt work…
I use that exact name… Please help
